long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
9gag recently introduced a "feature" that shows a lot of spam in the notifications via the "replied to a comment you followed" notification. This makes the notification bell almost unusable for web users.

This plugin filters the notification list. With any button press, a filter is applied that leaves all notifications intact, but just removes the spam notifications from the list. 
The video explains how and shows the actual code used.
